_header: It was a rich man o land / Full far beyond the sea woning
Note: For another version see Handlyng Synne (1283), lines 5569-5944.
_description: Piers Toller, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
yt was arych man of landffull far be ȝond þe se
                    wonnand…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…þat yt may wasch our syns a way& wyn vs to þat
                    blys þat lastes ay
